user.title: PV Optimizer Setup
user.description: Configure global settings for PV Optimizer.

error.duplicate_name: A device with this name already exists.

global_config.title: Global Configuration
global_config.description: Configure global parameters for the PV Optimizer. {info}

data_description.surplus_sensor_entity_id: The sensor that provides PV surplus/deficit values (negative = surplus)
data_description.sliding_window_size: Time window for averaging power measurements (1-60 minutes)
data_description.optimization_cycle_time: How often the optimizer runs (10-300 seconds)

data_description.name: A unique name for this device
data_description.type: Switch: On/Off control | Numeric: Value adjustment
data_description.power: The device's nominal power consumption in Watts
data_description.optimization_enabled: Whether this device should be managed by the optimizer
data_description.invert_switch: Turn OFF to activate, ON to deactivate (for normally-closed switches)
data_description.measured_power_entity_id: Optional: Sensor providing actual power consumption (overrides nominal power)
data_description.power_threshold: Power threshold in Watts to determine if device is ON (when using measured power)
data_description.min_on_time: Device must stay on for at least this duration (prevents short-cycling)
data_description.min_off_time: Device must stay off for at least this duration (prevents short-cycling)
